title: Silver ADC LFT
body:
Hey guys,

I'm looking to maybe join or make a team with some people to play in comps/flex/tournaments or something. Haven't played in a team before so i want to have some fun but play properly at the same time. 
Not sure how that all works but yeah!

I main ADC, mostly xayah or cait but can lots of them fairly well.
I am 23, live in NSW and fairly chill :)

Discord is PatrickStar#9624 and IGN is PatrikkStar

replies.body:
Threw you a friend request on discord
